name: "Crowned Lion" [112-101-110-102] T-shirt - 100% Organic Ring Spun Cotton
description:
From British designer Lawrence Cox, Dusty Paw’s Crowned Lion t-shirt is an original way to show your wild side.

Made with certified 100% organic, ring spun cotton it feels amazing, and is kind to the environment.

Certified By: 

Fair Wear Foundation
Global Organic Textile Standard
Organic Soil Association
Carbon Trust

T-shirt Colour: White

Label: Printed, Reducing Fabric Use

name: Dandelion Flight [104-101-109-111] Bamboo Viscose and Organic Ring Spun Cotton
description:
Inspired by Gulliver’s travels, artist Steve Harris from Australia brings to Dusty Paw the unique Dandelion Flight.  It’s an amazing image that deserves closer inspection…

Available in dark grey and printed on a mixture of bamboo viscose and organic ring spun cotton, the tee has a small environmental footprint, but a HUGE style.

Certified By:

Fair Wear Foundation
Oeko-Tex Standard

T-Shirt Colour: Charcoal

name: Embroidered Logo [113-102-110-102] T-shirt - 100% Organic Ring Spun Cotton
description:
Show the world how much you love Dusty Paw with the simple symbol that started it all.  

Designed by Dom Desmond, this 100% organic, ring spun cotton tee features a high quality embroidered Dusty Paw logo.

Certified By: 

Fair Wear Foundation
Global Organic Textile Standard
Organic Soil Association
Carbon Trust

T-shirt Colour: White

Label: Printed, Reducing Fabric Use

name: "Hibernation Wear" [110-101-110-102] T-Shirt Bamboo Viscose and Organic Ring Spun Cotton
description:
It’s a bear rocking some lounge wear, all ready to hibernate…what’s not to love?  Stand out from the high street crowd with some original style.

Designed by independent South African artist, Ben Grib the t-shirt is made from 70% Bamboo Viscose / 30% Organic Ring Spun Cotton making it incredibly eco-friendly and super-soft.

Certified By:

Fair Wear Foundation 
Oeko-Tex Standard

T-Shirt Colour: White

name: "Moustache" [117-105-111-103] T-shirt - 100% Ring Spun Cotton
description:
Brought to Dusty Paw’s UK shores by South African designer Ben Grib, our famous moustache design is unique and on trend at the same time.

This independently designed tee is made from 100% organic ring spun cotton and available in heather grey.


T-shirt Colour: Heather gray

name: "Triangles" [118-101-110-102] T-shirt - 100% Organic Ring Spun Cotton
description:
Designed by Dom Desmond, the minimalist, geometric Triangles design is one of Dusty Paw’s earliest designs, and still one of our most popular.

Made with certified 100% organic, ring spun cotton it looks as good to the environment as it will on you.


Certified By: 

Fair Wear Foundation
Global Organic Textile Standard
Organic Soil Association
Carbon Trust

T-shirt Colour: White

Label: Printed, Reducing Fabric Use
